column10: 2015. mr. villarreal served in the u. s. marine corps during world war ii & korean conflict. he married the love of his life florence g. villarreal in 1950 at first baptist church where he was a life time member. gil retired after 41 years of civil service as a computer operator at kelly afb. he operated gils appliance & fix it shop for 4 decades. he earned his plumbing certificate from st. philips college extending his services to small engine & plumbing repair. he was a mason and member of prospect hill chapter # 817
